name: Lords of the Land: Demon's Abode
name_original: Lords of the Land: Demon's Abode
description:
This is the page where you can find demo and preview builds of my in development RPG game : Lords of the Land : Demon's Abode

CONTROLS:

will take some x-input, generic controller input

left stick - move

right stick - camera

bottom face button - select

right face button - cancel (?)

keyboard

WASD - move

IJKL - camera

U O - zoom in, out

H - yeets player towards z negative (don't use on  ladders and stairs :) )
